d:
After a month of work, i finally managed to finish this project. Itâ€™s a really great work by Z-Ton.
I hope he comes back, and that we get to see more mummy girl doujins! :>
Big thanks to -hardtack- for helping me complete this and to hobohobo for the Raw

Speaking of theories, I believe the backstory involves a deceased Pharaoh and the high priestess Maberix who was chosen to be his afterlife companion since her purity would allow her to pass the Weighing of Souls.
However, the Queen refused to accept this. To prevent Maberix from joining the Pharaoh in the afterlife, the Queen used the "Immortality Elixir" and secretly exiled her to this remote Japanese outpost.
n: [Doujinshi] [Z-Ton] Nihon Egypt Setsu | The Japan-Egypt Theory (How I Found a Jiggly, Beautiful Mummy) [English] [Digital]
